'''Misuzu''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Taurus Iracundus Chapter]], Act I: [[Rise Up, Golden Soul]]. Her husband is [[Sugimoto]] and is [[Daisuke]]'s mother.
